attributes.action: one local authority for north of the humber
attributes.additional_details: we call on the British Government to abolish the Councils of Hull City and East Riding of Yorkshire. And to create a new authority to replace both of there boundarys, Also the new authority will have more devolved powers along with more funding to deliver better services to the people. it would also save the local tax payers money because both authoritys at the moment are doubling up and this is not the way forward both in the delivery of services and economically.
